solution_line_template: Multiply the number of shells collected each day by {num_days}, to get the total number of seashells Evie has collected: {shells_per_day} x {num_days} = <<{shells_per_day}*{num_days}={total_shells}>>{total_shells} seashells

Subtract the {shells_given} shells she gave her brother, to get the number of shells she has left: {total_shells} - {shells_given} = <<{total_shells}-{shells_given}={shells_left}>>{shells_left} seashells
